title: My Portfolio
aboutGreeting: Hello there! I'm Kaushik, currently an undergrad at VIT Vellore pursuing CSE
projects: This Python-based chat application allows multiple Mac users to communicate with each other through a single server - hosted locally or online
Blockz simulates UPI with secure sign-up, login, transfers, live balance, and history—mimicking real-world online banking.
Real-time System Monitor built with Python, Dash & Plotly showing CPU, RAM, disk, network, battery & process stats with theme toggle.
An AI model that learns through reinforcement learning to become a skilled game player, engaging and improving by playing with the user

An interactive 2D platformer that allows players to explore and engage with my portfolio by roaming and interacting with objects
